prompt:
Image Prompt:
Create an ethereal and symbolic representation of the concept of "God in three persons" inspired by the Christian doctrine of the Trinity. Depict a majestic and glowing figure embodying the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit as distinct yet unified entities. Use celestial imagery like rays of light, halos, and symbolic elements such as a dove to convey the divine nature of this triune Godhead. Capture the essence of unity, mystery, and reverence in a visually captivating and spiritually uplifting composition.
